trans-unit.source: The Planning Processes page manages the processes for a job, which are derived from the calculation lines. The view contains the essential information for:

trans-unit.source: This page will not contain any lines until the Planning Processes have been completed (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Process Planning and Scheduling.htm#_Ref383506555" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Process Planning and Scheduling” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: In the Planning Processes page, a significant number of fields are populated with values from the Job Planning and Processing view. Therefore, the following table does not provide a complete description of each field.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current state of the WBS position. The options are:

trans-unit.source: Indicates with symbols or letters if there is a conflict with dates or resource availability (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Capacity and Resource Planning.htm#_Ref383508086" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Detect Conflicts” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of hours that have not been planned, i.e., resources have not yet been allocated (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Capacity and Resource Planning.htm#_Ref383503173" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Assign Planning Resources” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of hours that have not been planned, i.e., resources have not yet been allocated (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Capacity and Resource Planning.htm#_Ref383503173" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Assign Planning Resources” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: The Navigate tab has two action groups: Planning and MS Project. The actions in each group are described in the following sections.

The actions in each group are described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: The actions in the Planning group are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Job Planning Setup page, which is defaulted from Standard Planning Setup and can be changed for individual Job planning parameters.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Planning Setup page, which is defaulted from Standard Planning Setup and can be changed for individual Job planning parameters.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Job Position Card page, which provides a card view of all the information in the Planning Processes page for the selected WBS position.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Position Card page, which provides a card view of all the information in the Planning Processes page for the selected WBS position.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Job Team page, which displays all planning resources assigned to the job.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Team page, which displays all planning resources assigned to the job.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Planning Res. Availability page, which displays availability for the resource in a matrix view (refer to topic “Availability Overview” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Availability page, which displays availability for the resource in a matrix view (refer to topic “Availability Overview” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Opens the Planning Res. Allocation page, where resources can be assigned to WBS planning positions (refer to topic “Resource Allocation” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Allocation page, where resources can be assigned to WBS planning positions (refer to topic “Resource Allocation” on page 1).
